column2:
"Those screenshots I took with the three of us...
To be honest, they turned out great."
"Thanks for helping out! Let's do it again some time!"
"Some people know how to dress themselves really cutely."
"When I see someone like that, I like to sneak a look at their fashion information. They can't tell you're doing it, so it's totally safe!"

"Uh, um, I mean...
My storage, it's full of costumes...!
Ugh, I need to organize this..."
"I used to be really afraid of big enemies..."
"But other ARKS helped me conquer that fear. I'm glad I had them helping me."
"You want accessories that look good on Casts...?"
"Hmm, what would look good? Let's see now..."
"How about a \"Ribbon Casquette Hat\" or a \"Fluffy Skirt\"?"
"You could go for a bold, cute kind of look? But maybe that's just the kind of look that works for me."
"Have you met Zect yet? If not, you should go to the central plaza."
